title: Jim Morrison Speaks - The Lost Interview
description:
This second volume of previously unavailable interviews from the Doors Archives features a never-before-released interview that was conducted on October 13, 1970 on the patio of The Doors&#039; West Hollywood office by reporter Salli Stevenson for Circus Magazine (which, along with Rolling Stone and Creem, was one of the first outlets for rock journalism). The near-hour long conversation has been painstakingly restored and conveniently indexed into 41 separate questions and answers. It offers remarkable insight into Jim Morrison&#039;s viewpoints and visions about his past, present, and future.  


URL: http://www.rhinohandmade.com/browse/ProductLink.lasso?Number=7909
